oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Invitation to attend lecture by Confederate naval officer Raphael Semmes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: From [JR] Milholland to Miss Emma Taylor, informing her that "tomorrow evening there will a lecture by Raphael Semmes on the exploits of the [CSS] Alabama." Semmes commanded the Alabama in the famous naval battle with the USS Kearsarge off the coast of France. The gentleman writes: "If you desire to go, it will afford me a great deal of pleasure to accompany you."
